p: Several investigations on the chemical composition of Chiliadenus glutinosus have been published previously and have identified about one hundred different chemical compounds [ 24, 25, 26]. In the present study, it has been decided to select and analyze the following seven phytochemicals: camphor, borneol, lucinone, glutinone, kutdtriol, quercetin, and kaempferol, from the total of compounds, as they are present in greater proportions in the essential oil of Ch. glutinosus. The study of the biological activity of the selected phytochemicals could contribute to support or refute the traditional medicinal uses of the species in Spain.
